mads.note: Brill's New Pauly: "Timagetus, Author of a work Περὶ λιμένων/Perí liménōn ('On Harbours') of at least two books surviving in seven frr., probably from the first half of the 4th cent. BC (FHG 4, 519 f.): six frr. in scholia ad Apoll. Rhod. 1,224-226a W. (otherwise FGrH 42, F 3)..." Gärtner, Hans Armin (Heidelberg), “Timagetus”, in: Brill’s New Pauly, Antiquity volumes edited by: Hubert Cancik and , Helmuth Schneider. Consulted online on 29 December 2016
